reply.message: Hi there, Colby. Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our 0% APR InstaCash was able to provide assistance to you! Additionally, we designed Instacash to help you access smaller amounts of cash in a pinch, such as for an unexpected late fee or a can't-miss date night and we designed it to be easy to pay back! It isn't meant to be a way to fund your larger expenses. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in maximum increments of $50. We appreciate your feedback regarding InstaCash so that we can continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: I love the app, I just don't like the fact you can only get your money in bundles of $50 making you pay $10 for every transactions. If you could take out the full amount you want with only be charged one fee would make it alot better .
title: I love the app

reply.message: Hi there, Anjea! Thank you so much for this awesome review and feedback! We want to inform you that with 0% APR InstaCash, you can spot yourself some cash anytime. How soon you can get your funds depends on the delivery method you choose and whether you're sending the funds to your RoarMoney account. We offer turbo delivery options to your RoarMoney or external account for a small fee of $3.99 - $4.99 so that you may receive your funds instantly. Alternatively, we offer free delivery options within 24-48 hours to your RoarMoney account or 3-5 business days to an external account. Additionally, tips are absolutely optional, and do not impact eligibility or availability, however, we encourage you support the community and we highly appreciate it! You see, it takes a big team here at MoneyLion to keep 0% APR Instacash running smoothly 24/7. Your tips are what help us cover the high costs of administering Instacash at 0% APR for the large and growing MoneyLion community. Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: The reason i give them 2 stars is because the instacash feature is nice, although if you want the money asap it's an extra $4.99 per transaction. Almost every time i go on different pages the app constantly asks me for a tip. I wouldn't mind leaving a tip if you weren't charing for withdrawals or even if i didnt have to select no tip 6 times before withdrawing $30 just to get gas for the week and maybe a snack or two for work.
title: Leave a tip?

reply.message: Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesn’t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip — thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash advance to many, many folks like you!
